title: Starbucks Font
content:
Does anyone know what font they use for the cinnamon promotion on their website  
 [www.starbucks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091712/http:/www.starbucks.com/ "www.starbucks.com")

thanks in advance  
Freddy
author: fsamuel

comments.content:
“Cinnamon Dolce Latte” looks like Ketchup.  
 [http://www.identifont.com/show?5UB](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091712/http:/www.identifont.com/show?5UB "http://www.identifont.com/show?5UB")

distressed afterward with sprinkled cinnamon, i think.

is that the one you were asking about?

jarrod
i think thats the one... thanks so much

<cite>’...with sprinkled cinnamon, i think.’</cite>

Hmmm, ketchup with cinnamon! ;)
might be as good as ukranian chili ketchup!
